mapper.update: UPDATE room SET hotel_room_count = COALESCE(hotel_initial_count, 0) - COALESCE(( SELECT COUNT(hotel_room_num) FROM room_info WHERE room_info.hotel_room_num = room.hotel_room_num GROUP BY room_info.hotel_room_num ), 0)
mapper.select: select hotel_room_count from room where hotel_room_num = #{hotelRoomNum};
